flawed_nl_solution:
Michael has used 1100 rubber bands because 22 x 50 = <<22*50=1100>>1100
Michael has 3900 rubber bands remaining because 5000 - 1100 = 3900
Michael can make 31 large balls because 3900 / 300 = <<3900/300=31>>31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
